name: Love Me Not (itch) (Hat)
description:
T h e y l o v e m e ,  t h e y lo v e m e n o t ~

You are an up and coming streamer with millions of fans worldwide. Despite that, you maintain a close relationship with your audience and they in return, adore and worship you--maybe a little too much.

Unbeknownst to you, there are three individuals  who yearn for something more, and they are willing to do whatever it takes to form a connection with you. Whether that is a good or not, it all depends on you.

Dahlia

A strange young man who appears to you when in your time of need. He is quiet, unassuming and nervous but strangely, you seem to find yourself intertwined with him.

Lily

A rich heiress who likes to tease you. You find yourself enraptured and wary of her intense obsession with you. Still, you can't help but find yourself drawn to her flirtations. 

Boglárka

A bubbly and peculiar young girl who likes to bake you sweets. You find her to be quite an exhausting character but you can't help but to smile at her perseverance at pursuing you. 

  • Gender-neutral player character
  • 3 good endings, 4 bad endings
  • Variety of dialogue 
  • 3 unique love interests
  • Custom artwork 
  • ~1-2  hours of gameplay
  • Horror-based elements
  • Yanderes be warned!
  • Story, programing and art by Mishatventures
  • LoFi beats by Lukrembo

A/N:  I'm a  solo game dev who's just learning the ropes of coding so I would love it if you would leave some critical or positive feedback!  

Tips are also greatly appreciated cause college ain't gonna pay for itself! ^_^
